name: ADIDAS Men Feather Black Sandals
description:
This pair of Bio STR canvas shoes from adidas is lightweight and comfortable for the feet. In a cool black and white colour combination, it's a great addition to your casual wardrobe. Wear this with your favourite tee and denims.

Upper
Canvas upper for durability, comfort, breathability and easy maintenance
Fabric overlay on sides of the midfoot to represent adidas patented 3-Stripe and for enhanced midfoot support
Long tongue for comfort
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit
Durable PU toe box and foxing
Brand badge appliqué d on the tongue
Padded sockliner for all-day comfort

Midsole
PU midsole for durability and cushioning

Outsole
Durable rubber outsole with herringbone pattern lugs for maximum traction and grip

shoe care
Wipe dirt off with a moist cloth
To remove tough stains, make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

shoe care

This pair of Vigor canvas shoes from adidas is light and comfortable on the feet. In a funky blue and red combination, it's a great addition to your casual wardrobe.

Upper
Canvas upper for durability, comfort, breathability and easy maintenance
Synthetic leather strips on the sides of the midfoot to represent adidas' logo and for enhanced midfoot support
Long and padded tongue for comfort
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit
Durable rubber toe box and toe guard
Brand badge appliqué d on the tongue
Padded sockliner for all-day comfort

Midsole
EVA midsole for durability and cushioning

Outsole
Durable rubber outsole with circular lugs for maximum traction and grip

shoe care
Wipe dirt off with a moist cloth
To remove tough stains, make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

name: Nike Men Egoli TF White Sports Shoes
description:
An entry level turf football shoe, the nike Egoli TF cleat comes in a low-top clean design that makes it a great fashion statement as well.

Upper
Ultra-lightweight synthetic leather that adjusts to the foot shape and works to keep feet locked in place
Lace-ups for a snug Fit
Contoured speed last for an ergonomic fit
Cushioning at the heel provides a more comfortable feel and helps keep the heel from slipping

Midsole
Contoured sockliner at the midsole for cushioning to reduce stud pressure
PU midsole for lightweight comfort and impact protection

Outsole
TPR outsole engineered for responsiveness and explosive bursts of speed while ensuring excellent traction
Firm, yet flexible outsole that helps reduce stud pressure
Turf-friendly studs for maximum traction

Wash care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

description:

Foamy rubber midsole
Two piece outsole with an arched midfoot, outsole has grooves and lugs
Warranty for manufacturing defects: 6 months (not valid on products with more than 20% discount)

description:
Stylish and comfortable, these Capri II sneakers from nike will add an extra bounce to your step. Lightweight and sleek, you can wear them all day long to feel like you're walking on a bed of cotton.

Upper

nike Swoosh appliquéd on sides for branding and style

EVA midsole for long-term durability and protection of feet against impact

Mesh lining for improved breathability

Outsole
Lightweight, slip-resistant rubber outsole for better shock absorption
Herringbone pattern all over for better traction on all surfaces

shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
Do not store in direct sunlight

description:

Upper
Synthetic leather upper with nike swoosh overlays on either side of the midfoot for style
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit
